titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of the first Saturday of every January as "National FIRST Robotics Day".
Expressing support for the designation of the first Saturday of every January as "National FIRST Robotics Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary:
This resolution supports the designation of a National FIRST Robotics Day and its celebration around the United States.
The resolution also encourages schools and educators to observe the day with activities that teach students about robotics and engage them with the study of mathematics and science.
